creator: paul@productivitynet.com
text:
It appears that regardless of where the tc_log is directed, Tomcat always 
prints the message "Starting tomcat. Check logs/tomcat.log for error messages".

creator: sriramnrn@gmail.com
text:
More a case of CANTFIX. Even a fix to Tomcat 3.3 wouldn't make much of a
difference, since we're not likely to make any release at all.
